tool_description: THE SHUFFLER.FM API ALLOWS ANYONE TO BUILD THEIR OWN PROGRAMS USING SHUFFLER.FM DATA. BESIDES ACCESSING PUBLIC DATA, THE LATEST API V2 ENABLES YOU TO CREATE PERSONALIZED APPS. IT'S REST AND SPEAKS JSON OVER HTTPS.
name: Shuffler.fm
title: Shuffler.fm

api_list.name: CREATE SUBSCRIPTION

required_parameters.name: entity
required_parameters.description: The entity type of the object to subscribe to.

required_parameters.name: entity_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the object to subscribe to.

api_list.name: CREATE FAVORITES

required_parameters.name: track_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the track on Shuffler.fm that you want to favorite.
